nde2.types.discovery

Class DetailedArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.types.NDE2Result
      • nde2.types.discovery.Area
        • nde2.types.discovery.DetailedArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DetailedArea
extends Area
    This class of objects represents UK's administrative and geographical areas in more detail. You want this in order to get the OS-grid encoded envelope for this area if you want to use maps.
    Author:
    filip
    See Also:
    Area}, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getExtCode

        public String getExtCode()
        Returns:
        The SNAC code for this area

      • getEnvelope

        public String getEnvelope()
        This is not a polygon wrapping the area by its borders; there's an OpenSpace API for that. This is just a rectangle that is just big enough to contain this area.
        Returns:
        Ordnance Survey easting/northing envelope of this area.

      • getMandatoryMetadata

        public Node getMandatoryMetadata()
        Returns:
        The "mandatory" metadata for this area.

        Returns:
        The "optional" metadata for this area.
